suite.name: VG Del main

test.name: Login With Unregistered Username

kw.name: Given User is on the login page
Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'file:///C:/Mjukvarutestare Utbildning/Testautomation för Continuous Testing/dinopark-lab1/dinopark-lab1/webpages/jurap.html'.

The chromedriver version (132.0.6834.110) detected in PATH at C:\Users\sjuba\Webdriver\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (133.0.6943.127); currently, chromedriver 133.0.6943.126 is recommended for chrome 133.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: When User enters an unregistered username
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then System should display an error message: "Invalid username or password."
Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'id=login-message' should have contained text 'Invalid username or password.' but its text was 'Verifying credentials...'.
kw.status: Element 'id=login-message' should have contained text 'Invalid username or password.' but its text was 'Verifying credentials...'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'id=login-message' should have contained text 'Invalid username or password.' but its text was 'Verifying credentials...'.
kw.status: Element 'id=login-message' should have contained text 'Invalid username or password.' but its text was 'Verifying credentials...'.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'id=login-message' contains text 'Invalid username or password.'.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

test.doc: Verifies that login fails for an unregistered username.

suite.doc: Grupp 1, Sjubaib - VG_Del Testar ogiltig registrering och inloggning för att verifiera systemets felhantering. - Registrering: Nekad vid för kort lösenord samt redan existerande användare. - Inloggning: Nekad vid felaktigt lösenord samt oregistrerad användare.

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (132.0.6834.110) detected in PATH at C:\Users\sjuba\Webdriver\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (133.0.6943.127); currently, chromedriver 133.0.6943.126 is recommended for chrome 133.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
